questions.question: What is the Maven groupId of the task-manager project? (Provide the groupId)
What is the Maven artifactId of the parent project? (Provide the artifactId)
What Java version is used for compilation? (Provide the version number)
How many modules are defined in the parent POM?
How many test files (*Test.java) are in the repository?
Which module uses WAR packaging? (Provide the module artifactId)
How many external packages (excluding test dependencies) are declared in dependencyManagement?
What test framework is used for all tests? (Provide the framework name)
How many Java source files are in the common module?
How many Java source files are in the domain module?
How many buildable components (JARs/WARs) are produced by this repository?
What source files are used to build the common component? (Provide a list)
What source files are used to build the domain component? (Provide a list)
List all components that domain depends on (use component names).
List all components that persistence depends on (use component names).
List all components that service-task depends on (use component names).
List all components that api-gateway depends on (use component names).
List all components that app-web depends on (use component names).
Which modules have zero inter-module dependencies? (Provide a list of artifactIds)
What types of components are built in this repository? (Provide a list)
In what order must the components be built to satisfy all dependencies? (Provide the build order as a list starting with no dependencies, use component names)
What is the maximum dependency depth in this repository? (Provide the depth number)
If the common component fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list, use component names)
How many components can be built in parallel at the start (have zero dependencies)?
Which component(s) have no other components depending on them? (Provide a list, use component names)
What programming language is used for all components?
List all external package names (group:artifact:version format). (Provide a list)
How many test definitions are in this repository?
Does this repository have any cross-language dependencies? (Answer yes or no)
How many aggregator components are in this repository?

correlation.pattern: Agents with higher baseline show less improvement from RIG

time_reduction_vs_score_improvement.correlation_note: Greater time reduction correlates with better score improvement
